bibdata.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Electric Installations on Textile Machinery
IEEE Recommended Practice for Electric Installations on Textile Machinery

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The following topics are dealt with: electric installations; textile machinery; machine wiring; motor-control equipment; conductors; electric stop-motion equipment; direct-current equipment; grounded circuits; equipment grounding; junction boxes; raceways; conduits; overcurrent; control circuits; undervoltage protection; equipment identification.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
